PROCESSTYPE.name: Docusign Fact Provider Flow
PROCESSTYPE.BPMNXML:
<definitions targetNamespace="http://www.activiti.org/test" expressionLanguage="http://www.w3.org/1999/XPath" typeLanguage="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:omgdi="http://www.omg.org/spec/DD/20100524/DI" xmlns:omgdc="http://www.omg.org/spec/DD/20100524/DC" xmlns:bpmndi="http://www.omg.org/spec/BPMN/20100524/DI" xmlns:activiti="http://activiti.org/bpmn" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns="http://www.omg.org/spec/BPMN/20100524/MODEL">
  <process isExecutable="true" name="Docusign Fact Provider Flow" id="io.point.Docusign_provider">
    <startEvent name="Start" id="startevent1"/>
    <serviceTask activiti:class="plugins.fact_components.api_Docusign_Read_Obj_toFields" name="Sign" id="task3">
      <extensionElements>
        <activiti:field name="objType">
          <activiti:expression>${objTypeId}</activiti:expression>
        </activiti:field>
        <activiti:field name="objKey">
          <activiti:expression>${objId}</activiti:expression>
        </activiti:field>
      </extensionElements>
    </serviceTask>
    <sequenceFlow targetRef="exclusivegateway1" sourceRef="startevent1" id="flow1"/>
    <endEvent name="End" id="endevent1"/>
    <exclusiveGateway default="default" name="Exclusive Gateway" id="exclusivegateway1"/>
    <sequenceFlow targetRef="task3" sourceRef="exclusivegateway1" name="GET" id="flow14">
      <conditionExpression xsi:type="tFormalExpression">${apidata_method == "GET"}</conditionExpression>
    </sequenceFlow>
    <sequenceFlow targetRef="endevent1" sourceRef="task3" id="flow17"/>
    <sequenceFlow targetRef="endevent1" sourceRef="exclusivegateway1" name="Unsupported" id="default"/>
    <userTask activiti:formKey="poi_default_view" name="Default" id="usertask1"/>
    <serviceTask activiti:class="plugins.fact_components.api_Docusign_OAuth_Save" name="OAuth2" id="servicetask1">
      <extensionElements>
        <activiti:field name="username">
          <activiti:expression>${username}</activiti:expression>
        </activiti:field>
        <activiti:field name="password">
          <activiti:expression>${password}</activiti:expression>
        </activiti:field>
      </extensionElements>
    </serviceTask>
    <sequenceFlow targetRef="servicetask1" sourceRef="exclusivegateway1" name="OAuth" id="flow18">
      <conditionExpression xsi:type="tFormalExpression">${apidata_method == "PUT"}</conditionExpression>
    </sequenceFlow>
    <sequenceFlow targetRef="endevent1" sourceRef="servicetask1" id="flow19"/>
  </process>
  <bpmndi:BPMNDiagram id="BPMNDiagram_io.point.Docusign_provider">
    <bpmndi:BPMNPlane id="BPMNPlane_io.point.Docusign_provider" bpmnElement="io.point.Docusign_provider">
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="BPMNShape_startevent1" bpmnElement="startevent1">
        <omgdc:Bounds y="164.0" x="70.0" width="35.0" height="35.0"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="BPMNShape_task3" bpmnElement="task3">
        <omgdc:Bounds y="30.0" x="334.0" width="105.0" height="55.0"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="BPMNShape_endevent1" bpmnElement="endevent1">
        <omgdc:Bounds y="164.0" x="740.0" width="35.0" height="35.0"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="BPMNShape_exclusivegateway1" bpmnElement="exclusivegateway1">
        <omgdc:Bounds y="161.0" x="150.0" width="40.0" height="40.0"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="BPMNShape_usertask1" bpmnElement="usertask1">
        <omgdc:Bounds y="220.0" x="334.0" width="105.0" height="55.0"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="BPMNShape_servicetask1" bpmnElement="servicetask1">
        <omgdc:Bounds y="100.0" x="334.0" width="105.0" height="55.0"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge id="BPMNEdge_flow1" bpmnElement="flow1">
        <omgdi:waypoint y="181.0" x="105.0"/>
        <omgdi:waypoint y="181.0" x="150.0"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge id="BPMNEdge_flow14" bpmnElement="flow14">
        <omgdi:waypoint y="161.0" x="170.0"/>
        <omgdi:waypoint y="57.0" x="170.0"/>
        <omgdi:waypoint y="57.0" x="334.0"/>
        <bpmndi:BPMNLabel>
          <omgdc:Bounds y="41.0" x="179.0" width="23.0" height="13.0"/>
        </bpmndi:BPMNLabel>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge id="BPMNEdge_flow17" bpmnElement="flow17">
        <omgdi:waypoint y="57.0" x="439.0"/>
        <omgdi:waypoint y="57.0" x="757.0"/>
        <omgdi:waypoint y="164.0" x="757.0"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge id="BPMNEdge_default" bpmnElement="default">
        <omgdi:waypoint y="181.0" x="190.0"/>
        <omgdi:waypoint y="181.0" x="740.0"/>
        <bpmndi:BPMNLabel>
          <omgdc:Bounds y="164.0" x="209.0" width="63.0" height="13.0"/>
        </bpmndi:BPMNLabel>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge id="BPMNEdge_flow18" bpmnElement="flow18">
        <omgdi:waypoint y="161.0" x="170.0"/>
        <omgdi:waypoint y="127.0" x="170.0"/>
        <omgdi:waypoint y="127.0" x="334.0"/>
        <bpmndi:BPMNLabel>
          <omgdc:Bounds y="115.0" x="173.0" width="100.0" height="13.0"/>
        </bpmndi:BPMNLabel>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge id="BPMNEdge_flow19" bpmnElement="flow19">
        <omgdi:waypoint y="127.0" x="439.0"/>
        <omgdi:waypoint y="127.0" x="757.0"/>
        <omgdi:waypoint y="164.0" x="757.0"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
    </bpmndi:BPMNPlane>
  </bpmndi:BPMNDiagram>
</definitions>

    <startEvent name="Start" id="startevent1"/>

    <userTask activiti:formKey="poi_default_view" name="Default" id="usertask1"/>
    <serviceTask activiti:class="plugins.fact_components.api_Docusign_OAuth_Save" name="OAuth2" id="servicetask1">
      <extensionElements>

PROCESSTYPE.name: Docusign Fact Provider Flow
PROCESSTYPE.BPMNXML:
<definitions targetNamespace="http://www.activiti.org/test" expressionLanguage="http://www.w3.org/1999/XPath" typeLanguage="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:omgdi="http://www.omg.org/spec/DD/20100524/DI" xmlns:omgdc="http://www.omg.org/spec/DD/20100524/DC" xmlns:bpmndi="http://www.omg.org/spec/BPMN/20100524/DI" xmlns:activiti="http://activiti.org/bpmn" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns="http://www.omg.org/spec/BPMN/20100524/MODEL">
  <process isExecutable="true" name="Docusign Fact Provider Flow" id="io.point.Docusign_provider">
    <startEvent name="Start" id="startevent1"/>
    <serviceTask activiti:class="plugins.fact_components.api_Docusign_Read_Obj_toFields" name="Sign" id="task3">
      <extensionElements>
        <activiti:field name="objType">
          <activiti:expression>${objTypeId}</activiti:expression>
        </activiti:field>
        <activiti:field name="objKey">
          <activiti:expression>${objId}</activiti:expression>
        </activiti:field>
      </extensionElements>
    </serviceTask>
    <sequenceFlow targetRef="exclusivegateway1" sourceRef="startevent1" id="flow1"/>
    <endEvent name="End" id="endevent1"/>
    <exclusiveGateway default="default" name="Exclusive Gateway" id="exclusivegateway1"/>
    <sequenceFlow targetRef="task3" sourceRef="exclusivegateway1" name="GET" id="flow14">
      <conditionExpression xsi:type="tFormalExpression">${apidata_method == "GET"}</conditionExpression>
    </sequenceFlow>
    <sequenceFlow targetRef="endevent1" sourceRef="task3" id="flow17"/>
    <sequenceFlow targetRef="endevent1" sourceRef="exclusivegateway1" name="Unsupported" id="default"/>
    <userTask activiti:formKey="poi_default_view" name="Default" id="usertask1"/>
    <serviceTask activiti:class="plugins.fact_components.api_Docusign_OAuth_Save" name="OAuth2" id="servicetask1">
      <extensionElements>
        <activiti:field name="username">
          <activiti:expression>${username}</activiti:expression>
        </activiti:field>
        <activiti:field name="password">
          <activiti:expression>${password}</activiti:expression>
        </activiti:field>
      </extensionElements>
    </serviceTask>
    <sequenceFlow targetRef="servicetask1" sourceRef="exclusivegateway1" name="OAuth" id="flow18">
      <conditionExpression xsi:type="tFormalExpression">${apidata_method == "PUT"}</conditionExpression>
    </sequenceFlow>
    <sequenceFlow targetRef="endevent1" sourceRef="servicetask1" id="flow19"/>
  </process>
  <bpmndi:BPMNDiagram id="BPMNDiagram_io.point.Docusign_provider">
    <bpmndi:BPMNPlane id="BPMNPlane_io.point.Docusign_provider" bpmnElement="io.point.Docusign_provider">
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="BPMNShape_startevent1" bpmnElement="startevent1">
        <omgdc:Bounds y="164.0" x="70.0" width="35.0" height="35.0"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="BPMNShape_task3" bpmnElement="task3">
        <omgdc:Bounds y="30.0" x="334.0" width="105.0" height="55.0"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="BPMNShape_endevent1" bpmnElement="endevent1">
        <omgdc:Bounds y="164.0" x="740.0" width="35.0" height="35.0"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="BPMNShape_exclusivegateway1" bpmnElement="exclusivegateway1">
        <omgdc:Bounds y="161.0" x="150.0" width="40.0" height="40.0"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="BPMNShape_usertask1" bpmnElement="usertask1">
        <omgdc:Bounds y="220.0" x="334.0" width="105.0" height="55.0"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="BPMNShape_servicetask1" bpmnElement="servicetask1">
        <omgdc:Bounds y="100.0" x="334.0" width="105.0" height="55.0"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge id="BPMNEdge_flow1" bpmnElement="flow1">
        <omgdi:waypoint y="181.0" x="105.0"/>
        <omgdi:waypoint y="181.0" x="150.0"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge id="BPMNEdge_flow14" bpmnElement="flow14">
        <omgdi:waypoint y="161.0" x="170.0"/>
        <omgdi:waypoint y="57.0" x="170.0"/>
        <omgdi:waypoint y="57.0" x="334.0"/>
        <bpmndi:BPMNLabel>
          <omgdc:Bounds y="41.0" x="179.0" width="23.0" height="13.0"/>
        </bpmndi:BPMNLabel>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge id="BPMNEdge_flow17" bpmnElement="flow17">
        <omgdi:waypoint y="57.0" x="439.0"/>
        <omgdi:waypoint y="57.0" x="757.0"/>
        <omgdi:waypoint y="164.0" x="757.0"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge id="BPMNEdge_default" bpmnElement="default">
        <omgdi:waypoint y="181.0" x="190.0"/>
        <omgdi:waypoint y="181.0" x="740.0"/>
        <bpmndi:BPMNLabel>
          <omgdc:Bounds y="164.0" x="209.0" width="63.0" height="13.0"/>
        </bpmndi:BPMNLabel>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge id="BPMNEdge_flow18" bpmnElement="flow18">
        <omgdi:waypoint y="161.0" x="170.0"/>
        <omgdi:waypoint y="127.0" x="170.0"/>
        <omgdi:waypoint y="127.0" x="334.0"/>
        <bpmndi:BPMNLabel>
          <omgdc:Bounds y="115.0" x="173.0" width="100.0" height="13.0"/>
        </bpmndi:BPMNLabel>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge id="BPMNEdge_flow19" bpmnElement="flow19">
        <omgdi:waypoint y="127.0" x="439.0"/>
        <omgdi:waypoint y="127.0" x="757.0"/>
        <omgdi:waypoint y="164.0" x="757.0"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
    </bpmndi:BPMNPlane>
  </bpmndi:BPMNDiagram>
</definitions>

PROCESSTYPE.BPMNXML:
<definitions targetNamespace="http://www.activiti.org/test" expressionLanguage="http://www.w3.org/1999/XPath" typeLanguage="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:omgdi="http://www.omg.org/spec/DD/20100524/DI" xmlns:omgdc="http://www.omg.org/spec/DD/20100524/DC" xmlns:bpmndi="http://www.omg.org/spec/BPMN/20100524/DI" xmlns:activiti="http://activiti.org/bpmn" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns="http://www.omg.org/spec/BPMN/20100524/MODEL">
  <process isExecutable="true" name="Stub Fact Provider Flow" id="io.point.stub_provider">

      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="BPMNShape_usertask2" bpmnElement="usertask2">

        <omgdi:waypoint y="181.0" x="150.0"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge id="BPMNEdge_default" bpmnElement="default">
